name: nfeud
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wnf(s0, weu(s1, w1)))
-| wnf(s1, w0)
-| wi(wa(w0, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wnf(s0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wnf(s0, weu(s1, w1)))
-| wnf(s1, w0)
-| wi(wa(w0, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wnf(s0, w1))

stmt.origin: adantr(w0, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wnf(s0, w1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wnf(s0, w1))
-| wi(w0, wnf(s0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wnf(s0, weu(s1, w1)))
-| wnf(s1, w0)
-| wi(w0, wnf(s0, w1))

comment: Bound-variable hypothesis builder for the unique existential quantifier. Deduction version of ~ nfeu . (Contributed by NM, 15-Feb-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 7-Oct-2016.)
